definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Kehe is the management elite with foresight and dedicated spirit.
sentences.chinese: 遠見卓識富有奉獻精神的管理精英。

sentences.english: Thousands of peer-reviewed scientific studies over decades all pointing to one conclusion?
sentences.chinese: 近二十年來有千萬個遠見卓識的研究都指向這個結論？

sentences.english: PFW stands for visionary thinking for outstanding services today and tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: PFW體現了今天與明天優質服務之遠見卓識。

sentences.english: We have lost a real far-sighted people.
sentences.chinese: 我們失去了一位真正具有遠見卓識的人。

sentences.english: All this represents farsightedness of the Finnish government in developing ties with China.
sentences.chinese: 這些都體現出芬蘭政府在發展對華關係上的遠見卓識。

sentences.english: He is respected by his people for his foresightedness.
sentences.chinese: 他由於遠見卓識而受到人民的尊敬。

sentences.english: He was my friend and I believed in his vision .
sentences.chinese: 他是我的朋友，對於他的遠見卓識我深信不移。

sentences.english: Sometimes, some foresight and a little support is all it takes.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，你只需要一些遠見卓識和一點小小的支持。

sentences.english: True visionaries are often misunderstood by their own generation.
sentences.chinese: 真正有遠見卓識者往往受同時代人的誤解。

sentences.english: Wu Its ruling military, practical for purport, foresight, counsel is uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 其治國用兵，以務實爲旨，遠見卓識，謀略不凡。

definition: (of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
